StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCandidateAddress]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonId int, @AddressType int, @StreetAddress varchar(50), @StreetAddress2 varchar(50), @CityCode varchar(4) = null, @CountyCode varchar(3), @StateCode varchar(2), @ZipCode varchar(9), @LastEditBy varchar(15) ) AS DECLARE @charType varchar(10)
IF(@AddressType = 1) SET @charType = 'C' ELSE SET @charType = 'H'
IF (@CountyCode IS NULL) BEGIN SELECT @CountyCode = COUNTY_CODE FROM GEO_LOCATION WHERE STATE_CODE = @StateCode AND CITY_CODE = @CityCode END
IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_ADDRESS] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonId AND [ADDRESS_TYPE] = @charType) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_ADDRESS] SET [STREET_ADDRESS] = @StreetAddress ,[STREET_ADDRESS_2] = @StreetAddress2 ,[CITY_CODE] = @CityCode ,[COUNTY_CODE] = @CountyCode ,[STATE_CODE] = @StateCode ,[ZIPCODE] = @ZipCode ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonId AND [ADDRESS_TYPE] = @charType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_ADDRESS] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[ADDRESS_TYPE] ,[STREET_ADDRESS] ,[STREET_ADDRESS_2] ,[CITY_CODE] ,[COUNTY_CODE] ,[STATE_CODE] ,[ZIPCODE] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid]) VALUES (@PersonId ,@charType ,@StreetAddress ,@StreetAddress2 ,@CityCode ,@CountyCode ,@StateCode ,@ZipCode ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ,NEWID()) END
